subject: Re: IS ANYONE HERE INTERESTED IN ANYTHING OTHER THAN  POSTING EVP`S HERE ?
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Fact is, I started with all the old stuff, white noise, and read Raudive, Jorgenson, and anything else I coulkd find on the web.I quickly found better methods, such as EVPmaker, and if you claim that doesn't work you'll just be announcing your ignorance. From EVPmaker I came up with the box idea, the theory behind the box, as well as EVPmaker is provide a "raw audio", that is sound that contains bits of human speech, and "they" will talk. "They" being various entities and spirits. 

 Why would anyone want to go back to old shit!? 

F-S



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "ozestrangeufo" <ozestrangeufo@...> wrote:
>
> Hi
> Is there anyone here interested in anything to do with some of the
> science/history behind the EVP phenomena.?Or is this just a forum for
> posting evp`s and guessing what they said.Just a little confused..and I
> mean no offense..
> Mike
>
